WorkItem.Description:
So I've just started testing out the new modules, and I loaded up my tankadin (http://www.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Icecrown&n=Yukinojo). Rawr.Tankadin incorrectly reports her as crittable, despite having a 493 Defense. I understand there has been some argument about Resillience + Defense at edge cases, but there is no argument whatsoever here: 490 Defense Skill is uncrittable vs. bosses, period. The module reported chance to be crit at 0.48000001%.
Â 
I have some programming skills, though I've never used C#, so I will be looking at the source code myself to figure out what might be causing this... but like I said I've never used C# so if someone else gets it done first that'd be great, heh.

Comments.Message: Unfortunately, Ermad isn't developing Rawr.Tankadin anymore, and it's not complete, as you noticed, so we're looking for someone else to take it over.

Hmm, I actually just decided I am going to finish Rawr.Tankadin. I am bored and want to code something, and this isn't too far from being done. I am installing Visual Studio now to start work on it again.

If you notice any other bugs let me know. The main thing I have to finish is melee hit mechanics to accurately represent SoR/White hit tps, and to ensure correctness of all formulas.
OK, I'll keep testing it, I'm happy to do so. I can try helping with some code, but all of my coding experience is in C++ or Objective-C, not even Java, so some C# things are kinda alien to me.
